snippet.title: Within the Cosmos - Gameplay Trailer | Sci-Fi FPS RPG
snippet.description:
Releasing on 4 October 2024
Wishlist on Steam!

Steam page: 
store.steampowered.com/app/618330

Within the Cosmos is a sci-fi RPG. You awaken in a secluded star system. Shortly after arriving, you discover a fractured society, dealing with a newfound android threat. Explore planets, uncover mysteries, and navigate differing philosophies. Your choices will shape how the story unfolds.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/withinthecosmos

Instagram: https://instagram.com/withinthecosmos

Facebook: https://facebook.com/withinthecosmos
